column4: can someone recommend a video player other than Totem or VLC?
I agree that VLC is awsome, but unfortunately audio is not working for me and Totem just won't play the video at all
u don't have it configured then. go to the configuration and change the audio output to the correct one
I configured it to use the pulse audio plugin is that not enough?
I don't really know, I am on Hardy Heron if that helps
what audio driver are you using?
I don't know, how can I check?
i would guess you are using alsa so: sudo apt-get install alsa-oss
if you don't know you are using alsa
vlc is an oss app so you need to install alsa-oss
and suddenly sound works, thank you WhoNeedszzz
